title: Yellow Horseshoe Balloon
summaries: The Yellow Horseshoe Balloon is an accessory that grants immunity to fall damage, increases jump height by 75%, and grants a double-jump. The height of the first jump is increased from 6 blocks to 10½ blocks, while the double-jump's height is increased from 15 blocks to 26½ blocks, reaching a total of 37 blocks with both jumps.
Jump height is instead reduced by 15% when underwater, reducing your total underwater height from 27 blocks (8 + 19 from Sandstorm jump) to 22 blocks (7 + 15 from Sandstorm jump).

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows the holder to double jump
Increases jump height and negates fall damage
statistics.Sell: 3
